title: About Me
name: Revan
description: Detail-oriented Quality Assurance Engineer and Information Technology Graduate (GPA 3.74/4.00) with a strong foundation in automation testing and AI engineering.

I have a proven track record of improving application stability for national-scale platforms and leading high-performing teams in tech competitions. My approach combines technical precision with innovative problem-solving.
Committed to delivering bug-free, user-centric software solutions. I continuously hone my skills in tools like Selenium, Katalon, and Python to stay ahead of the curve.
